## Checklist

Before requesting review, ensure:

- [ ] **CI/quality green** — lint, typecheck, and unit tests pass
- [ ] **Platform builds green** — both Windows and macOS builds succeed
- [ ] **Docs updated** — if behavior changed, docs are updated accordingly
- [ ] **No secrets exposed** — no tokens, keys, or credentials in code/logs
- [ ] **Release gating acknowledged** — releases are blocked if CI fails (see `docs/RELEASING.md`)
